From the reddit post:

I have created, what is possibly, the most challengingly dull challenge of the season! I challenge you, people of the Internets! Reclusives, brief skimmers of Reddit, Youtubers, Tweeter, Code Monkeys, anyone with a computer, to take the challenge! The challenge is to collect all the red blocks on a 30X30X30 chunk of blocks!

Simples' aye?

Not really. 30 cubed is 27,000. But to the the random nature and inherent crappyness of the game design its more like 15,000-23,000. And there are about 25 - 45 red blocks. Simples.....

So yeah, I made a game thats vaguely not christmas themed, but I figure when else does everybody have so much spare time!
